title: Space Engineers v01.013.008 [Portable Steam Rip]
description:
Space Engineers v01.013.008 [Portable Steam Rip]

Two step run process.
1. Extract using 7zip, WinRar or an archiver of the same variety.
2. Run

* No Installation
* No Crack
* No Steam
* No Hassle

You need to have .NET Framework 4.0 installed. Link below. <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718</a>

Seed for others once your download completes; it makes everyone's lives more beautiful.

Support the devs if you enjoyed!

Notes

* 10+ of the highest rated Steam Workshop Maps are included. Follow the instructions to properly get them working.
* Since KSH (devs) still have their api tracking tool included, the tutorial on blocking them is included.
* Direct Steam Rip. All content (excluding the .NET Framework 4.0, DotNet 4.0 and the 2010/2012 vcredist Redistributables) is included.
* Read the included Readme file
* The Steam Workshop is Disabled
* Portable Release (can be stored and played on a memory device)



Space Engineers v01.013.008 Changelog
01.013.008 32bit
Build: 2014-01-03 12:05
01.013.008 64bit
Build: 2014-01-03 12:06

Update 01.013.007 has been released. We have enabled the refinery and the assembler. The refinery can he used to refine the ore that you have mined and create ingots which can be used later in the assembler in order to craft new components.

At the moment, every world has only a few types of ore available for mining. To gain more types of ore, search in cargo boxes. Everyone who starts a new world will get all types of ore in the characterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s inventory.

(Refinery and Assembler video for 1.013)

Features
- enabled refinery
- enabled assembler
- motor is now named rotor
- default character inventory now contains ore
- cargo containers now contain random ore

Fixes
- improved explosion performance
- fixed explosion particle effect

Our Team enjoys these updates as much as you do and we couldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t miss this weekÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s update despite the holidays pause!
Wishes for a Happy 2014 from all the Space Engineers members!
